articles.description: According to reports in England, Arsenal lead the race for a world-class Chelsea transfer target. He may have just dodged a bullet.
articles.content: Arsenal are finally transforming into a world-class team again. Of late, they have become a team to be feared, rather than the fearful team they were a few seasons ago. This was personified when news… [+1832 chars]
